titleStmt.title: Rump, or, An exact collection of the choycest poems and songs relating to the late times by the most eminent wits from anno 1639 to anno 1661.
titleStmt.author: Brome, Alexander, 1620-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Brome and Henry Marsh,
